pages.text: The Beneath has a full set of new biomes to explore! Most are split into two categories: $(thing)upper$() and $(thing)lower$(). The upper biomes are only found higher up, while the lower ones are closer to the lava.

pages.title: Lush Hollow
pages.text: Humid and full of greenery! The most hospitable area for an underground base.

pages.title: Decaying Caverns
pages.text: Nature's recyclers are hard at work in this damp region full of rot.

pages.title: Webbed Lair
pages.text: No prizes for guessing what lives here! Also features huge $(thing)Travertine$() pillars.

pages.title: Ash Forest
pages.text: What remains of the Lush Hollow after the frequent fires caused by the heat.

pages.title: Lava Floes
pages.text: An ore-rich $(thing)Pyroxenite$() area crisscrossed with rivers of lava.

pages.title: Basalt Deltas
pages.text: Everyone's favourite nether biome returns, and is just as dangerous to navigate as ever.

pages.title: Deep Caves
pages.text: Between the other biomes are more plain areas of either Gabbro, Schist, Granite, Diorite, and Gneiss.$(br)
